title: Modern Rcon Toll v0.6 (COD4 Admin Tool)
description:
Modern Rcon Tool is a Admin Tool for Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare.

it&#039;s easy to use. Probably the easiest.

Features:
* Kick (one or all), ban (perm and temp),
* PunkBuster (kick & ban, take screenshots of players)
* Edit gametypes
* Edit map rotation, change to next map, pick any map u want
* Chat (you can chat with ppl on the server without even beeing in the game)
* Console (perform console commands without even beeing in the game)
* Message Center (Setup your own message rotation for your server and set the wanted time you want between messages)
